h2. My Desktop Buckets

{{html:
<div ng-cloak ng-show="!buckets || buckets.length == 0">
}}

Desktop buckets bring an innovative new way to deliver end user IT. Create a collaboration space where each user has a unified all in one cloud application portal to manage applications and data across all devices! Desktop Buckets uses a single sign on portal that lists the users' applications and connects them transparently to the selected apps. Users can use any device with a browser that supports html5. That is the case for all modern browsers and most smart devices like smartphones and tablets.

Start now and create your Desktop Bucket:

{{html:
    <form class="form-horizontal" method="get" action="Create Desktop Bucket">
    <fieldset>

    <!-- Button -->
    <div class="control-group">
      <div class="">
        <button id="singlebutton" name="singlebutton" class="btn btn-info btn-large ">Create Desktop Bucket</button>
      </div>
    </div>

    </fieldset>
    </form>
</div>

<table ng-app="myApp" ng-controller="ListDesktopBucketsController" class="table table-striped table-bordered"
    ng-cloak ng-show="buckets && buckets.length > 0">
    <thead>
        <tr>
            <th></th>
            <th></th>
            <th>Email</th>
            <th>User type</th>
        </tr>
    </thead>
    <tbody>
        <tr ng-repeat="bucket in buckets">
            <td>
                <a href="Main Office#/{[bucket.id]}">Edit Package</a>
            </td>
            <td>
                <a href="Connecting">Manage</a>
            </td>
            <td>{[bucket.email]}</td>
            <td>{[bucket.userType]}</td>
        </tr>
    </tbody>
</table>

    <script src="/$$space/.files/js/controllers/DesktopBuckets/ListDesktopBucketsController.js" type="text/javascript"></script>
    <script src="/$$space/.files/js/services/others.js" type="text/javascript"></script>
 }}
